Events
Looking for somewhere to host your next event? Brewlands Bar and Billiards has ample room for groups of any size! All of our food packages include table time for 4 hours and drink tickets are available upon request.
Please leave a message with your name, phone number, email address, number of people and if you are interested in a food package, and our event coordinator will get back to you with detailed information!
Contact Us Regarding The Events

About us
Our Story
Our story begins in 2014 when the love of the game became a reality. Four gentlemen out of Lakeland Florida had a dream, to separate the thought of a game of pool and a dive bar. That November, Brewlands Bar and Billiards was born. Michael, Larry, Stuart, and Chad had a vision for an non-smoking, upscale billiards club where all feel welcomed and all become family. All 4 of our locations are family-friendly during the day, and we have roughly 20 – 29 pool tables depending on the location, 7 bull shooter dartboards, and outdoor patio areas. Each establishment offers something special and unique, that provides a more relaxed and sophisticated night-life experience for patrons looking for drinks, food, conversations, music and culture.
We hope you enjoy your visit.
Thank You for becoming apart of our family!
Happy Hour Specials Open - 7 PM

Daily Lunch Menu Open - 4:30pm

Daily Food and Food Specials
We are an upscale Billiards Hall/Sports Bar hosting:
Non- Smoking with a large outdoor patios.
20 – 22 Brunswick tables that are 8′ and 9′ at both our Lakeland and Tampa Locations
29 Diamond tables 7′ and 9′ at our Clearwater Location.
5 – 7  Bullshooter dart boards at every location
Golden Tees and other games available
24 – 36 Beers on draft depending on the location
85′ Granite bar with 30+ HD TV’s
Full liquor and Wine Selection
Upscale Bar Food Menu
.entry-content
